this_title: Horizon: Which Universe Are We In?
trans_title: BBC 地平线：我们身处哪个宇宙
introduction: Imagine a world where dinosaurs still walk the earth. A world where the Germans won World War II and you are president of the United States. Imagine a world where the laws of physics no longer apply and where infinite copies of you are playing out every storyline of your life.It sounds like a plot stolen straight from Hollywood, but far from it. This is the multiverse.Until v...
chinese_title: BBC 地平线：我们身处哪个宇宙
foreign_title: Horizon: Which Universe Are We In?
